<function=create_calendar_event>{"title": "Lunch", "start_time": "2024-05-19 11:30:00", "end_time": "2024-05-19 12:30:00", "description": "Catch up over lunch.", "participants": ["sarah.baker@gmail.com"], "location": null}</function>

The error message indicates that the time format is incorrect. The `create_calendar_event` function expects the time to be in the format "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM" without seconds. I will try again with the correct time format.
